attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove is compromising children’s education and futures by continuously undermining the education system, the teaching profession and the achievements of millions of students.

Ill thought out changes are being implemented at speed, with limited consultation.

In order to continue to improve and move forward in educating our children, we must improve the quality of strategy, policy and leadership from the top. The existing leadership has lost public confidence.

A cross-party committee should examine in full the potential costs of Mr Gove’s actions, the long term damage to the profession and education in Britain.
The changes he has bought into our education system are destroying what chances us children had. We need the old policies back that where bought in by the Labour Government!
